verses.verse: שִׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֗ר <S%H1697><s%> ye the word אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> speaketh יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> unto בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> unto you O house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about דֶּ֤רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> not the way הַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּלְמָ֔דוּ <S%H3925><s%> Learn וּמֵאֹת֥וֹת <S%H226><s%> at the signs הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּחָ֑תּוּ <S%H2865><s%> and be not dismayed כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Although יֵחַ֥תּוּ <S%H2865><s%> are dismayed הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> for the heathen מֵהֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> at them

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because חֻקּ֥וֹת <S%H2708><s%> For the customs הָֽעַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> of the people הֶ֣בֶל <S%H1892><s%> [are] vain ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because עֵץ֙ <S%H6086><s%> a tree מִיַּ֣עַר <S%H3293><s%> out of the forest כְּרָת֔וֹ <S%H3772><s%> for [one] cutteth מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> the work יְדֵ֥י־ <S%H3027><s%> of the hands חָרָ֖שׁ <S%H2796><s%> of the workman בַּֽמַּעֲצָֽד׃ <S%H4621><s%> with the axe

בְּכֶ֥סֶף <S%H3701><s%> it with silver וּבְזָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> and with gold יְיַפֵּ֑הוּ <S%H3302><s%> They deck בְּמַסְמְר֧וֹת <S%H4548><s%> it with nails וּבְמַקָּב֛וֹת <S%H4717><s%> and with hammers יְחַזְּק֖וּם <S%H2388><s%> they fasten וְל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not יָפִֽיק׃ <S%H6328><s%> that it move

כְּתֹ֨מֶר <S%H8560><s%> as the palm tree מִקְשָׁ֥ה <S%H4749><s%> They [are] upright הֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> and they וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יְדַבֵּ֔רוּ <S%H1696><s%> but speak נָשׂ֥וֹא <S%H5375><s%> not they must needs יִנָּשׂ֖וּא <S%H5375><s%> be borne כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Because לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יִצְעָ֑דוּ <S%H6805><s%> because they cannot go אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּֽירְא֤וּ <S%H3372><s%> Be not afraid מֵהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> like כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יָרֵ֔עוּ <S%H7489><s%> of them for they cannot do evil וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> any הֵיטֵ֖יב <S%H3190><s%> neither also [is it] in them to do good אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> else אוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H854><s%> for ס

מֵאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> There כָּמ֖וֹךָ <S%H3644><s%> like יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Forasmuch as [there is] none like unto thee O LORD גָּד֥וֹל <S%H1419><s%> thou [art] great אַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> you וְגָד֥וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [is] great שִׁמְךָ֖ <S%H8034><s%> and thy name בִּגְבוּרָֽה׃ <S%H1369><s%> in might

מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יִֽרָאֲךָ֙ <S%H3372><s%> Who would not fear מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> thee O King הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> [men] of the nations כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for לְךָ֖ יָאָ֑תָה <S%H2969><s%> is your due כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> among בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חַכְמֵ֧י <S%H2450><s%> forasmuch as among all the wise הַגּוֹיִ֛ם <S%H1471><s%> of the nations וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַלְכוּתָ֖ם <S%H4438><s%> and in all their kingdoms מֵאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> There כָּמֽוֹךָ׃ <S%H3644><s%> like

וּבְאַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> But they are altogether יִבְעֲר֣וּ <S%H1197><s%> brutish וְיִכְסָ֑לוּ <S%H3688><s%> and foolish מוּסַ֥ר <S%H4148><s%> [is] a doctrine הֲבָלִ֖ים <S%H1892><s%> of vanities עֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> the stock הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Silver מְרֻקָּ֞ע <S%H7554><s%> spread into plates מִתַּרְשִׁ֣ישׁ <S%H8659><s%> from Tarshish יוּבָ֗א <S%H935><s%> is brought וְזָהָב֙ <S%H2091><s%> and gold מֵֽאוּפָ֔ז <S%H210><s%> from Uphaz מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> the work חָרָ֖שׁ <S%H2796><s%> of the workman וִידֵ֣י <S%H3027><s%> and of the hands צוֹרֵ֑ף <S%H6884><s%> of the founder תְּכֵ֤לֶת <S%H8504><s%> blue וְאַרְגָּמָן֙ <S%H713><s%> and purple לְבוּשָׁ֔ם <S%H3830><s%> [is] their clothing מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> they [are] all the work חֲכָמִ֖ים <S%H2450><s%> of cunning כֻּלָּֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> are all

וַֽיהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> But the LORD אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> God אֱמֶ֔ת <S%H571><s%> [is] the true הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> God חַיִּ֖ים <S%H2416><s%> he [is] the living וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> and an everlasting מִקִּצְפּוֹ֙ <S%H7110><s%> at his wrath תִּרְעַ֣שׁ <S%H7493><s%> shall tremble הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot יָכִ֥לוּ <S%H3557><s%> shall not be able to abide גוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> and the nations זַעְמֽוֹ׃ <S%H2195><s%> his indignation ס

כִּדְנָה֙ <S%H1836><s%> Thus תֵּאמְר֣וּן <S%H560><s%> shall ye say לְה֔וֹם אֱלָ֣הַיָּ֔א <S%H426><s%> unto them The gods דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch שְׁמַיָּ֥א <S%H8065><s%> the heavens וְאַרְקָ֖א <S%H778><s%> and the earth לָ֣א <S%H3809><s%> that have not עֲבַ֑דוּ <S%H5648><s%> made יֵאבַ֧דוּ <S%H7><s%> [even] they shall perish מֵֽאַרְעָ֛א <S%H772><s%> from the earth וּמִן־ <S%H4481><s%> and from תְּח֥וֹת <S%H8460><s%> and from under שְׁמַיָּ֖א <S%H8065><s%> heavens אֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H429><s%> these ס

עֹשֵׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> He hath made אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> the earth בְּכֹח֔וֹ <S%H3581><s%> by his power מֵכִ֥ין <S%H3559><s%> he hath established תֵּבֵ֖ל <S%H8398><s%> the world בְּחָכְמָת֑וֹ <S%H2451><s%> by his wisdom וּבִתְבוּנָת֖וֹ <S%H8394><s%> by his discretion נָטָ֥ה <S%H5186><s%> and hath stretched out שָׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> the heavens

לְק֨וֹל <S%H6963><s%> his voice תִּתּ֜וֹ <S%H5414><s%> When he uttereth הֲמ֥וֹן <S%H1995><s%> [there is] a multitude מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> of waters בַּשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> in the heavens וַיַּעֲלֶ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> to ascend נְשִׂאִ֖ים <S%H5387><s%> and he causeth the vapours מִקְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> from the ends [אֶרֶץ כ] (הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> common ק) בְּרָקִ֤ים <S%H1300><s%> lightnings לַמָּטָר֙ <S%H4306><s%> with rain עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> he maketh וַיּ֥וֹצֵא <S%H3318><s%> and bringeth forth ר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the wind מֵאֹצְרֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H214><s%> out of his treasures

נִבְעַ֤ר <S%H1197><s%> is brutish כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> Every man מִדַּ֔עַת <S%H1847><s%> in [his] knowledge הֹבִ֥ישׁ <S%H3001><s%> is confounded כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every צוֹרֵ֖ף <S%H6884><s%> every founder מִפָּ֑סֶל <S%H6459><s%> by the graven image כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for שֶׁ֥קֶר <S%H8267><s%> [is] falsehood נִסְכּ֖וֹ <S%H5262><s%> for his molten image וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is no ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> and [there is] no breath בָּֽם׃

הֶ֣בֶל <S%H1892><s%> They [are] vanity הֵ֔מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H4639><s%> [and] the work תַּעְתֻּעִ֑ים <S%H8595><s%> of errors בְּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> in the time פְּקֻדָּתָ֖ם <S%H6486><s%> of their visitation יֹאבֵֽדוּ׃ <S%H6><s%> they shall perish

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> like כְאֵ֜לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these חֵ֣לֶק <S%H2506><s%> The portion יַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For יוֹצֵ֤ר <S%H3335><s%> [is] not like them for he [is] the former הַכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> of all ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> is He וְיִ֨שְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of all [things] and Israel שֵׁ֖בֶט <S%H7626><s%> [is] the rod נַֽחֲלָת֑וֹ <S%H5159><s%> of his inheritance יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> [is] his name ס

אִסְפִּ֥י <S%H622><s%> Gather up מֵאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land כִּנְעָתֵ֑ךְ <S%H3666><s%> thy wares [יֹשַׁבְתִּי כ] (יֹשֶׁ֖בֶת <S%H3427><s%> abide ק) בַּמָּצֽוֹר׃ <S%H4692><s%> of the fortress ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For כֹה֙ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> behold קוֹלֵ֛עַ <S%H7049><s%> Behold I will sling אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> out the inhabitants הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land בַּפַּ֣עַם <S%H6471><s%> at this once הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וַהֲצֵר֥וֹתִי <S%H6887><s%> and will distress לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of יִמְצָֽאוּ׃ <S%H4672><s%> them that they may find ס

א֥וֹי <S%H188><s%> Woe לִי֙ עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because שִׁבְרִ֔י <S%H7667><s%> is me for my hurt נַחְלָ֖ה <S%H2470><s%> is grievous מַכָּתִ֑י <S%H4347><s%> my wound וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I אָמַ֔רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> but I said אַ֛ךְ <S%H389><s%> Truly זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> this חֳלִ֖י <S%H2483><s%> this [is] a grief וְאֶשָּׂאֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H5375><s%> and I must bear

אָהֳלִ֣י <S%H168><s%> My tabernacle שֻׁדָּ֔ד <S%H7703><s%> is spoiled וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מֵיתָרַ֖י <S%H4340><s%> and all my cords נִתָּ֑קוּ <S%H5423><s%> are broken בָּנַ֤י <S%H1121><s%> my children יְצָאֻ֙נִי֙ <S%H3318><s%> are gone forth וְאֵינָ֔ם <S%H369><s%> no אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> more נֹטֶ֥ה <S%H5186><s%> of me and they [are] not [there is] none to stretch forth עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> again אָהֳלִ֔י <S%H168><s%> my tent וּמֵקִ֖ים <S%H6965><s%> any more and to set up יְרִיעוֹתָֽי׃ <S%H3407><s%> my curtains

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for נִבְעֲרוּ֙ <S%H1197><s%> are become brutish הָֽרֹעִ֔ים <S%H7462><s%> For the pastors וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not דָרָ֑שׁוּ <S%H1875><s%> and have not sought עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> after that לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> have not הִשְׂכִּ֔ילוּ <S%H7919><s%> therefore they shall not prosper וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מַרְעִיתָ֖ם <S%H4830><s%> and all their flocks נָפֽוֹצָה׃ <S%H6327><s%> shall be scattered ס

ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Behold the noise שְׁמוּעָה֙ <S%H8052><s%> of the bruit הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold בָאָ֔ה <S%H935><s%> is come וְרַ֥עַשׁ <S%H7494><s%> commotion גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> and a great מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> country צָפ֑וֹן <S%H6828><s%> out of the north לָשׂ֞וּם <S%H7760><s%> to make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עָרֵ֧י <S%H5892><s%> the cities יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah שְׁמָמָ֖ה <S%H8077><s%> desolate מְע֥וֹן <S%H4583><s%> [and] a den תַּנִּֽים׃ <S%H8577><s%> of dragons ס

יָדַ֣עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> I know יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor לָאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> of man דַּרְכּ֑וֹ <S%H1870><s%> that the way לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [is] not in himself [it is] not in man הֹלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> that walketh וְהָכִ֖ין <S%H3559><s%> to direct אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> צַעֲדֽוֹ׃ <S%H6806><s%> his steps

יַסְּרֵ֥נִי <S%H3256><s%> correct יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> but בְּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> me but with judgment אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay בְּאַפְּךָ֖ <S%H639><s%> not in thine anger פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> or תַּמְעִטֵֽנִי׃ <S%H4591><s%> lest thou bring me to nothing

שְׁפֹ֣ךְ <S%H8210><s%> Pour out חֲמָתְךָ֗ <S%H2534><s%> thy fury עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> upon the heathen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יְדָע֔וּךָ <S%H3045><s%> that know וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> and on מִשְׁפָּח֔וֹת <S%H4940><s%> thee not and upon the families אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> your בְּשִׁמְךָ֖ <S%H8034><s%> not on thy name לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not קָרָ֑אוּ <S%H7121><s%> that call כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אָכְל֣וּ <S%H398><s%> for they have eaten up אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> יַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob וַאֲכָלֻ֙הוּ֙ <S%H398><s%> and devoured וַיְכַלֻּ֔הוּ <S%H3615><s%> him and consumed וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נָוֵ֖הוּ <S%H5116><s%> him and have made his habitation הֵשַֽׁמּוּ׃ <S%H8074><s%> desolate פ
